description: The initiative, Coope Tarrazu, was founded in 1960 by 228 small coffee producers to address unfair market conditions. Today, it has over 4,500 members and processes approximately 250,000 quintals of coffee annually. Beyond coffee, the cooperative has diversified into various businesses, contributing significantly to the local economy. It focuses on sustainable practices, community support, and social projects, aiming to enhance the quality of life for its members and promote environmental stewardship.
name: Coope Tarrazu RL
